title: Exploring Hybrid Deep Learning Models for Understanding Early Alzheimer’s Disease Diagnosis Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: A smartphone-based learning environment with accessible educational materials

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the four diagnostic stages of Alzheimer’s disease.
Learners can understand the spatiotemporal analysis principles of the combined EfficientNet-B6 and LSTM model.
Learners can apply medical image preprocessing procedures (normalization, augmentation, etc.) to real-world cases.
Learners can design a logical framework connecting MRI data classification results to clinical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
